title: Smile
subtle: Concept (fiction), 31 words, Level A (Grade K), Lexile BR10L
description: What makes you smile? How do you feel when you smile? In Smile, students get to see all the people one little boy smiles at during his day. Students learn how to classify information as well as how to visualize while reading to better understand text. High-frequency words, detailed illustrations, and repetitive phrases make this book perfect for beginning readers.
reviewWords: brother, dad, dog, friend, mom, sister, smile, teacher, yourself
comprehension: Classify Information                : Classify information in a text
awareness: Initial Sound                : Discriminate initial consonant /s/ sound
wordWork: High-Frequency Words : Identify and use the high-frequency word your
